name: dog descends dungeon, dies?
description:
dog descends dungeon, dies? Too slow for you?

So, some feedback is that the player speed is too slow. As I'm not allowed to make changes to the game after jam submission, I put the power in your hands:

After starting a 'New Game', press the `~` key to bring up the console, and type `$game.args.state.game.player.speed = 6`

whizzzzzzzzzzzzzzz

Just, y'know, don't buff yourself too much while you're in there (definitely don't touch player attributes like `max_hit_points`, `hit_points`, `shot_speed`, `shot_range`...)

Controls Keyboard

W/A/S/D to fire up/down/left/right, CURSORS to move up/down/left/right, E to use bombs, Q to eat a mushroom (power up), SPACE to confirm in menus

Controller

Left Stick to fire up/down/left/right, Right Stick to move, B/CIRCLE to use bombs, Y/TRIANGLE to eat a mushoom (power up), A/CROSS to confirm in menus

Details

A somewhat barebones "Binding of Isaac-like" for LD48, written using DragonRuby Game Toolkit

LD48 Page

Credits

All code my me

Most graphics from, or adapted from, Canari Games CanariPack 8BIT TopDown
